hero.title: Detect ##HIGHLIGHT_START##Typos##HIGHLIGHT_END## with##BR##AI Precision
hero.subtitle: Upload your documents and let our advanced AI system identify and highlight spelling mistakes, grammar errors, and typos with incredible accuracy.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Detection
aiPowered.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms detect even the most subtle typos and grammatical errors.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Process your documents in seconds with our optimized detection engine.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your documents are processed securely and never stored on our servers.

about.title: About ##HIGHLIGHT_START##TypoDetector##HIGHLIGHT_END##
about.subtitle: TypoDetector is an advanced AI application designed to help you detect and correct typos in PDF documents with high accuracy and exceptional speed.

aiTechnology.title: Advanced AI Technology
aiTechnology.description: Using the latest machine learning algorithms to detect typos with up to 99.8% accuracy.

security.title: Guaranteed Security
security.description: Your documents are processed locally and not stored on our servers, ensuring data privacy and security.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Intuitive interface allows you to detect typos in just a few clicks.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to helping improve writing quality and communication by providing accurate, fast, and easy-to-use typo detection technology for everyone.
mission.quote: Creating AI technology that can help everyone write better and more confidently.

howItWorks.title: How ##HIGHLIGHT_START##TypoDetector##HIGHLIGHT_END## Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Easy and fast typo detection process in 4 simple steps

upload.title: Upload PDF
upload.description: Choose and upload the PDF document you want to check. Our system supports various PDF formats.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our AI will analyze every word in the document using advanced machine learning algorithms.

typoDetection.title: Typo Detection
typoDetection.description: The system will identify and mark all spelling errors, grammar mistakes, and typos.

getResults.title: Get Results
getResults.description: Get a corrected PDF with highlighted typos and detailed correction suggestions.

cta.title: Ready to Try?
cta.description: Upload your PDF document now and experience typo detection with cutting-edge AI technology.

contact.title: Contact ##HIGHLIGHT_START##Us##HIGHLIGHT_END##
contact.subtitle: Give feedback, report issues, or ask questions. We'd love to hear from you!

dataSecurity.question: Is my data safe?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes, documents are processed locally and not stored.

fileFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
fileFormats.answer: Currently supports PDF format with maximum size of 50MB.
